text.english: This is the Teacher Resources area. Where available, this area will provide supporting material for you and your students when using Online Practice. Resources displayed for teachers may be different from studentsâ€™ resources.
Click on a title or icon to open a resource. PDF files and documents will open in a new tab or download to your computer or device depending on your browser settings.
Click on an audio track title to play the file in your browser. Use the controls to play, pause and adjust the volume.
